participant_1.background:
My art has helped me cope with the loss of my parents.
I'm doing my best to stay positive and make the most of my time in school, but I miss being a kid sometimes.
my mom is a nurse.
and , my best friend is abigail.
one day i played the lottery.

participant_2.background:
My favorite thing to do is swim in the pool when my knee feels better.
I can't do a lot of things that other people can do because I'm in a wheelchair, but I try to stay positive and make the best of my situation.
I'm a power plant operator.
I am a solitary introvert who gets along best with my pets.
I make enough money to support my family and pursue my hobbies.

content.text: I am doing okay, thanks for asking!
That's good to hear. What are some of your hobbies?
I like to swim, when my knee feels better. I also like to read and play video games.
That's cool. I like to draw and paint. I also like to play video games.
Oh, that's awesome! I used to draw a lot when I was younger. I wish I had kept up with it.
You should start again! It's really fun and relaxing.
I might just do that! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a dog and a cat.
Oh, that's awesome! What are their names?
My dog's name is Sparky and my cat's name is Mittens.
Those are great names! I love animals.
Me too! They're the best companions.
Yes, they are. I'm glad you have them.
